https://rdm.abcd-j.de/instructions.html#: The dataset contains bulk seqeuncing data of B cells (Heavy chain, lamda chain and kappa chain) from the peripheral blood mononuclear cells (PBMCs) of 12 Myasthenia gravis (MG) patients. These 12 patients are identified  as four distinct patient phenotypes based on their proteomic patterns. 3 patients consist of each subgroups which is denoted as protein signature (PS) 1 to PS4.
